ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] hello
ygData.msgSnippet: I pre-ordered, because they mention that characters get a choice ... I m assuming that means a choice about solo vs grouping :) Does anyone know whether I ll
ygData.messageBody:
I pre-ordered, because they mention that characters
"get a choice"... I'm assuming that means a choice
about solo vs grouping :)

Does anyone know whether I'll be able to solo in the
new expansion? (assuming that I'm good at solo of
course, which I am).

Quwi


--- alexander.jones@... wrote:
> Theres still an issue open with Lost dungeons that
> delevels you to level50
> after you die. We have two guildies that had to be
> restored so I would
> advice some caution with preordering lodn yet. (they
> couldnt loot much of
> their gear haha).
>
> And yes, cancelling the subscription did not fix the
> problem, nor did
> relogging to desktop which was the boradcaster
> resolution from the GM:s. As
> of yesterday evening this problem still exists in
> some cases.
>
> Be careful...
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> Sent: den 19 juli 2003 23:15
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] hello
>
>
> Hi Donna!
> I pre-ordered Lost Dungeons and so far nothing
> unusual has happened to me.
> *knock on woodelf* I thought about cancelling and
> buying the CD but it would
> just be one more thing to worry about from the post
> office. I like the idea
> of it being $5 cheaper to buy the online version.
> luv, -Su
>
> >Hiya,
> >I just wanted to introduce myself.
> >My name is Donna. I play a 56 warrior on
> Bristlebane.
> >
> >Be careful if your thinking of ordering Lost
> Dungeons of Norrath.
> >Theres
> all kinds of problems with it. A fellow Guildie pre
> >ordered it and last
> night when he got killed he deleveled 7 levels.
> Here's a link to the kind of
> problems everyone is having.
> >
>
>http://forum.magecompendium.com/tower/viewtopic.php?t=6050
> >
> >I'm looking forward to meeting everyone.
> >donna
>
>
> So.. Anyone pre-order Lost Dungeons of Norrath?
> And is anyone going to
> wait
> to buy the storebought CD version that comes with
> a real life gift as well
> as an in-game gift of an 8 slot weight reduction
> bag for one character?
> luv,
> -Su
